item.title: PaintFlasher : Get Ready For A Seisure
item.dc:creator: @RdSoxFan618 RdSoxFan618
item.description:
@RdSoxFan618 wrote:

Get ready for seisure time! That’s right! A paint flasher! Joy Joy!

MAKE SURE TO DRAG THE CROSSHAIR OVER ONTO THE PAINT CANVAS!

This is my real first script, the other one just allowed you to cheat on a game where you just click, had about 4 lines.

Enough Chat, read the instructions and go have fun!

[code]//////P A I N T F L A S H E R

//WARNING. IF YOU ARE PRONE TO SEISURES, DO NOT START THIS
//Directions
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Open Up Paint (Start–>All Programs–>Accessories–>Paint)
//Make sure to drag the crosshair onto the canvas.
//That’s really all!
//And make sure to have all the tools and colors where I have them below
//Kk? Have Fun!

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////// //
//Tools //
//Tools Canvas //
//Tools Canvas //
//Tools //
//Tools //
/////// Canvas //
/////// //
/////// //
/////// //
/////// //
/////// //
//Colors Colors Colors Colors/////////////////////////
//Colors Colors Colors Colors/////////////////////////

///////////////////////////////Start///////////////////////////////////
program Paint;

procedure flash;
begin
MoveMouse(-17,39)
ClickMouse(-17,39,true)
MoveMouse(13,646)
ClickMouse(13,646,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(187,652)
ClickMouse(187,652,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(30,650)
ClickMouse(30,650,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(44,650)
ClickMouse(44,650,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(75,647)
ClickMouse(75,647,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(93,649)
ClickMouse(93,649,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
MoveMouse(-19,631)
ClickMouse(-19,631,true)
MoveMouse(446,243)
ClickMouse(446,243,true)
end;

begin
repeat
flash;

  Until(false)

end.[/code]

Read full topic
